item.description: 10:30 kickstands up.... We will go to Hull and toot the horns and say Hi at Lisa's cousins..((((every one gets a kick out of women riding))) Then we will proceed to the top of the hill and Fort for a leisurely lunch. There is a sandwich shop on the way to Hull before the fort, that we can hit to pick up lunch of choice.....Then we will proceed for more riding through the beauty of the coast. Eventually and as always to most ...... an ice cream stop either at Duxbury area or Pembroke.... Probably end the day around 4:00.....
item.name: Nantasket / Fort Revere / Castle Island (Level 1)
